article_text:
Wow, the breakup between President Obama and his former corporate health-care partners must have been bad. The deal he cut with the pharmaceutical industry to pass ObamaCare didn’t even last as long as his Presidency. We can’t wait for the memoir.

The news is that Mr. Obama’s new budget proposal for 2016 reneges on the quid pro quo that some of the dumber drug makers cut in return for supporting ObamaCare in 2009. That transaction was...

twitter.description: For helping pass the law, the drug companies get price controls, the Wall Street Journal writes in an editorial.
twitter.title: Big Pharma’s ObamaCare Reward

article_summary:
The deal he cut with the pharmaceutical industry to pass ObamaCare didn’t even last as long as his Presidency.
The news is that Mr. Obama’s new budget proposal for 2016 reneges on the quid pro quo that some of the dumber drug makers cut in return for supporting ObamaCare in 2009.
Wow, the breakup between President Obama and his former corporate health-care partners must have been bad.
That transaction was...
We can’t wait for the memoir.
